reviewText: Ordered this video because I was a fan back in the 80's/90's and tried to never miss a show.  Quality acting, top-notch writing and drama with some comedy relief.  Highly recommend for someone seeking television in it's heyday.

This is a great DVD. Quality is excellent.
It made me remember just what a great show LA Law was. Topics are timely even after all these years.
Haven't had a chance to watch this season yet.  Bring back memories.  Can't wait for Season 4 to come out.
Very good

Too much about lawyers personal lives (baby adoption) ..not enough law stories.

Other Problem... Season 4 and future seasons not available for U.S. DVD  players...  Very disappointed
good tv show...

One of my favorite 80's series. The picture quality gets better with each of the 1st 3 seasons. I wish they would release 4-8 in the USA (they're only available in the UK as far as I can tell). I can play R2 PAL; but I can't afford the prices. I really do want the entire series. Shout Factory are you listening? I don't think I'm alone in that wish!
good quality better than previous U.S. seasons.  had to get a region free dvd player to play.
Love it
An outstanding binge watch.
This season is great and there was no problems viewing any of the episodes.  I just wish that there were more seasons released!!
Thanks.

I'm sorry that there are only three official seasons available on DVD.  I see that later seasons are available on region 2 but I don't want to take a chance on them not playing on my DVD player, or having something of substandard quality.  I would love to get the remaining seasons.

L.A. Law is so entertaining. Intelligently written, with fleshed-out, believable characters and believable plots. Season 3 continues with its character development and the actors become more stable and comfortable in their roles. The episodes do a good job of trying to portray both sides of the cases that are up for trial. All in all it's an interesting series and I'm glad that at least the first three seasons are available on DVD.
Awesome
Excellent product just as displayed
excellent came very fast great deal
I love it!
I actually purchased the first 3 seasons, Used to love this when it here, happy to say I still love it

LA Law may get too personal at times, but the cases are great.  I wish they wold bring this back as I am sick and tired of thoser more recent programs where filming is done in the dark, the action is too fast-paced, and there is too much strobe lighting.
Huge fan of LA Law!  Was a big fan when it first came on tv YEARS ago!!!!!!
Pretty Good.  Looking forward to the next few which I remember to be the best with the turmoil boiling over in the firm and then we get Rosalyn!
Love the oldies

Loved this show, takes me back to the 80's to see it again and that makes it even more fun to watch. But so disappointed that in other countries this is available in every season, but not in the USA? Ridiculous! Obviously they can make it available in region 1.
Very enjoyable series.  I can tell it isn't digital as it isn;t very clear up close, but I just sit across the room.  Its a great cast.
This would have gotten 5 stars if the video quality had been digitally remastered.  Although I LOVE "L.A. Law", I will never understand why Shout Factory couldn't have provided a good quality video.
great
Not the best law drama, but better than several others. I would consider Good Wife and Boston Legal couple notch above L.A. Law.
Great shows.
Cool show
Glad to see this series finally came to DVD. I think I finished watching this in 3 days.

Best show ever, recommend to anyone who loves crime shows or mystery shows or is interested in the legal/courtroom system.  They don't make shows like LA LAW anymore. In my Top 5 of best television series of all time.  Its addicting!  Funny, fascinating, entertaining, makes you think.  All of the actors/actresses are phenomenal.
Great show
Very good show looking foward to the next season
I like the show LA Law.  I recommend this DVD to any LA Law fan.
great experience
One of the best series made for TV.
If you like the older legal dramas, you will love this one. I remember when this show was on TV, it was a very big hit and must see show.
Working my way down memory lane. Can't wait for season four..
good show

I loved this show when it was on the air and I still love it now.  My only question is when is season 4 going to be released?  I went to Shout Factory's website and there was no mention of a new release date.
Old school stuff but like old friends it makes the grade
The best law show ever
Fabulous show, great to see it again.
Continued excellence of a series that stands the test of time.
It is the memories, not the quality.

I was pleased when the DVDs arrived two-three weeks early.  Then I learned none of the DVDs worked.  When inserted my television screen read:  "Region error. Please eject the disc. Playback is not authorized in your region." To top things off, there was no receipt or  return shipping label enclosed in the package.  And I need to pay for return shipping to Canada or England...wherever. I am not a happy customer and want a full refund.
I loved LA Law when it came out originally and I am thrilled that is finally out on CD.  Can wait for season 5+6 to come out.

Will have the complete series eventually. When are the rest coming out?
Is the entire set going to be available in Blu-Ray?

Are we reviewing the show or the misleading REGION 2 PAL on the packaging? Region 2 PAL is for the EUROPE area, NOT the USA and CANADA. Then, some ads say REGION FREE, BUT the DVD's & packaging say REGION 2 PAL. Then again, they DO work on my ordinary DVD player here in the USA. CONFUSING? YOU BET!! ONE star for the labeling and advertising & 4 stars for the show.
Excellent show when it was on TV; even better to be able to watch it again.  Keep selling the seasons for us to buy.
It works just fine on an American blue ray player! I really have missed this show, what a great TV series!,

This is a review of the discs and not the series (10 out of 5 stars), which lives on as among the best that television has everr had to offer. In watching season 3 we've not some real issues with the audio at times. On several occasions the volume has suddenly fallen noticeably enough to require turning up the volume. Even after that, though, the dialogue was kind of chopped and muffled and discerning what the characters were saying was a challenge. We'll still finish this season, though, (our last of three), because we so loved this Bochco series. We're just sorry that seasons beyond number three aren't available for people in the US, though they can be had for other parts of the world. That's something I really don't understand, because I know scores of the remaining seasons would sell in the US.

This presents the full season with each episode approximately 48 minutes. No special features and the film looks very old and needs to be cleaned up. Some of the great guest stars include James Earl Jones, Wayne Tippit, Michael Cavanaugh, Renee Jones, Peter Turgeon, Charles  Lane, and Lew Ayres.

Some of the storylines this season: Roxy tries to get divorced, Stuart & Anne try to adopt, Leland is up for a judgeship, Abby opens her own practice and kills one of her first clients, Mickey and Grace kiss other people, and Benny gets a girlfriend.
Only have the 1st 3 sseasons of this but always the scrapes this law firm could get & out of.  Still enjoy some of the same actors & actresses today.
funny  wonderful writing
As described, thank you.
great product and support...
Extremely poor, non-digital, video transfer. Skin tones are orange; eyes and facial shadows are black. Episodes are unwatchable.
I loved this series when it was on television. I wish that all the seasons were available on DVD.
Outstanding
All was very enjoyable; the show still was fun to watch and the quality of the disc was perfect...no flaws.
